name: San Francisco LGBT Community Center
description: Since 2002, the San Francisco LGBT Community Center (SF LGBT Center) is a non-profit organization in San Francisco that serves members of the lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender communities. SF LGBT Center has programs that provide LGBTQ individuals access to opportunities and resources for them to heal and thrive.
